heading: mideast talks
subheading: arafat and netanyahu met separately with britain's blair in london today, ahead of meetings with secretary of state albright this afternoon. but prospects for a west bank breakthrough looked bleak. said arafat: "if prime minister netanyahu is seriously concerned and interested in peace, today is the day, now is the moment." netanyahu: "we have gone the extra mile, well beyond the extra mile."
author: wired staff
